page.title: 14THE FLOWER FESTIVAL
page.content: The theme of the 3 day exhibition at the local church was{'All Things {Bright and Beautiful'}and was in aid of the church restoration fund. The festival is organised bi-annually by local volunteers led by a committee of 4 ladies. Planning for the show had been underway since March. The thousands of blooms on display were arranged by various members of the community including the Girl Guides and the Young Wives' Group.Much of the estimated Â£200 cost (of the flowers) had been met from the proceeds of coffee mornings and evenings. Villagers had also donated flowers such as gladioli, carnations and lupins from their own gardens. It took those involved at least 4 days' preparation to set up the show. The event attracted approximately 1000 visitors.
